If all beds disappeared, where would you sleep?
Build a treehouse: If you have access to a sturdy tree, you can build a treehouse to sleep in. You'll need to make sure it's safe and secure before sleeping in it.
Use a hammock: If you have a hammock, you can use it to sleep in. Hammocks are comfortable and can be hung in various locations, such as trees or between two poles.
Use a storage container: You can use a storage container as a makeshift bed. You'll need to add a mattress and pillows to make it comfortable.
Use a camping tent: If you have access to a camping tent, you can use it to sleep in. You'll need to set it up in a safe and secure location, and make sure it's properly ventilated.
